name: Fiery Caverns
description:
! The HTML version may or may not work properly, you should probably download the exe. !

Have you ever been afraid of the dark? Have you ever wanted to be able to get over 12 unique achievements? Do you like 2d caving platformers? Then our game might make you mildly content for at least 3 minutes! Although most likely you’re gonna be fighting slimes for the next hour. Yes – they really are that good. In the making of this game we developed something entirely new – never before seen in any AAA-title game – SUPER AI. They are basically unbeatable. We think the only way to defeat these pesky monsters is to get like a 1 in 1800 hit on them while they are standing in a corner.

Oh well.

Ridden with bugs, unplayable because of OP monsters, cluttered to devastation with unwanted “achievements” – vote for our game, “Fiery Caverns” to win the Ludum Dare (as if, hah!)
